The Manickpur Police have booked a 31 - years - old man for allegedly driving his wife to suicide after he learnt about her affair with another man .
The deceased , Sushila Sutar , 28 , hanged herself to death in their residence at DG Nagar in Vasai West .
It was her brother who filed a police complaint at the Manickpur station about the alleged torture and mental stress the woman had had to go through .
The woman had an affair with a man residing in the same locality and the husband learnt about it , leading to petty fights and assault .
